org.apache.spark.rpc

接口 RpcCallContext


  • public interface RpcCallContext
    A callback that RpcEndpoint can use to send back a message or failure. It's thread-safe and can be called in any thread.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void reply(Object response)
      Reply a message to the sender.
      org.apache.spark.rpc.RpcAddress senderAddress()
      The sender of this message.
      void sendFailure(Throwable e)
      Report a failure to the sender.

    • 方法详细资料

      • reply

        void reply(Object response)
        Reply a message to the sender. If the sender is RpcEndpoint, its RpcEndpoint.receive will be called.
        参数:
        response - (undocumented)

      • sendFailure

        void sendFailure(Throwable e)
        Report a failure to the sender.
        参数:
        e - (undocumented)

      • senderAddress

        org.apache.spark.rpc.RpcAddress senderAddress()
        The sender of this message.
        返回:
        (undocumented)
